text: Ej mū'minon, on cunon ki jakdigarro nido mekuned, pajomʙarro nido nakuned (ja'ne jo Muhammad nagūed, ʙalki ʙo ehtiromu izzat ʙa in lafz ej pajomʙari Alloh, jo rasulalloh ʙigūed). Alʙatta, Alloh medonad onhoero, ki pinhonī ʙerun meşavand az nazdi Pajomʙar sallallohu alajhi va sallam. Bojad ki ʙitarsand onhoe, ki xilofi hukmi pajomʙar kor mekunand az in ki ʙirasad ʙa onho ʙa saʙaʙi xilofkoriaşon ʙalovu musiʙate jo ʙirasad ʙa onho azoʙi dardnok
